acceptance_criteria: Project directory structure is created with all required files
requirements.txt contains Django, psycopg2, and other dependencies
Django project is initialized with basic configuration
Database migration files are created
Environment variables are configured properly
tasks.description: Initialize the project with all required files and dependencies including Django, PostgreSQL, and basic application structure
tasks.title: Setup project structure and dependencies

acceptance_criteria: Project model is created with fields: name, description, repo_path, languages, frameworks, created_at, updated_at
API endpoints exist for: list, create, get, update, delete projects
All endpoints are properly secured and authenticated
Database migrations are created for the Project model
API responses follow consistent format
tasks.description: Create the Project model with all required fields and API endpoints for CRUD operations
tasks.title: Implement Project model and API endpoints

acceptance_criteria: Task model is created with fields: task_id, title, description, status, project_id, created_at, updated_at

All endpoints are properly secured and authenticated
Database migrations are created for the Task model
Task relationships are properly established with Projects
tasks.description: Create the Task model with all required fields and API endpoints for CRUD operations
tasks.title: Implement Task model and API endpoints

acceptance_criteria: Audit model is created with fields: action, user, resource_type, resource_id, details, timestamp
All major API endpoints are instrumented with audit logging
Audit trail is stored in the database
Audit endpoints are available for retrieving audit logs
Audit logging follows security best practices

tasks.title: Implement Audit Trail functionality

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard home page displays all runs in a Kanban board
Project list page displays all projects with key information
Project detail page shows project details, tasks, and related information
UI is responsive and works on different screen sizes
Light/dark theme support is implemented
tasks.description: Create the main dashboard with Kanban board view for runs and project overview
tasks.title: Implement Dashboard UI

acceptance_criteria: All models are tested with unit tests
All API endpoints are tested with integration tests
Test coverage is at least 80% for core functionality
Test suite runs successfully with pytest
Tests verify database operations and API behavior
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test suite to validate all models and API endpoints
tasks.title: Implement Test Suite

acceptance_criteria: PM agent can create projects and update specifications
DEV agent can implement code based on project specs
QA agent can write tests and verify implementation
SEC agent can perform security checks
Pipeline orchestrator manages handoffs between agents
tasks.description: Create the multi-agent workflow system with PM, DEV, QA, SEC roles
tasks.title: Implement Multi-Agent Pipeline

acceptance_criteria: Security checks are implemented for each stage of the pipeline
Security gates prevent advancement when checks fail
Security reports are generated and stored
Security agents can retry failed checks
Security integration with test suite
tasks.description: Create security checks and gates in the workflow pipeline
tasks.title: Implement Security Gates

acceptance_criteria: Deployment workflow allows human approval before deployment
Deployment history is tracked and stored
Deployment status is properly updated
Deployment endpoints are secured
Deployment integration with environments
tasks.description: Create deployment workflow with human approval and history tracking
tasks.title: Implement Deployment Management
